mapper.insert: insert into Topic (topicname, owner, starttime, lasttime, comments) values (#{topicname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lasttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comments})
mapper.update: update Topic SET lasttime = #{lasttime}, comments = comments + 1 where topicid = #{topicid};
